definitions.definition: A piece of paper or other token that entitles the holder to a discount, or that can be exchanged for goods and services.
examples: a voucher for a free kettle
This voucher entitles the bearer to a 20% discount on frozen goods.

definitions.definition: One who or that which vouches .
A copy of a published advertisement sent by the agency to the client as proof of publication .
A mechanical device used in shops for automatically registering the amount of money drawn .

main_definition: A piece of paper or other token that entitles the holder to a discount, or that can be exchanged for goods and services.
secondary_definitions: One who or that which vouches .
( advertising ) A copy of a published advertisement sent by the agency to the client as proof of publication .
( historical ) A mechanical device used in shops for automatically registering the amount of money drawn .
